title: Premium shall be charged for any relaxation other than the provisions of the said Regulations to be granted for construction of Free-sale component, at the rate prevailing then within the areas of respective Municipal Corporations for their areas
clause_text: Premium shall be charged for any relaxation other than the provisions of the said Regulations to be granted for construction of Free-sale component, at the rate prevailing then within the areas of respective Municipal Corporations for their areas.
